response.original_title: Why does TotalAV show upgrade pop-ups?➥ US-1-855-535-4580
response.overview: ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 TotalAV may display upgrade pop-ups when your current antivirus plan has limited features and the system is promoting premium protection tools like VPN, real-time malware shielding, identity protection ➤ US-1-855-535-4580, or advanced security optimization, and for clarification you can contact ➤ US-1-855-535-4580. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 These pop-ups are often triggered when a scan detects performance issues, outdated virus definitions, or features that require a higher-tier subscription, and a support specialist at ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 can explain which features are included in your plan. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 If your subscription is nearing expiration, expired, or set to basic coverage ➤ US-1-855-535-4580, the software may prompt you with renewal or upgrade notifications to maintain full cybersecurity protection, and calling ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 provides real-time billing assistance. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580
